markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Monk Resiliency](/Feats.aspx?ID=717) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 227 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Monk](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=8)

**Prerequisites**
[Monk Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=715); class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier

</column>

---

You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each monk archetype class feat you have. As you continue selecting monk archetype class feats, you continue to gain additional Hit Points in this way.
name: Monk Resiliency
prerequisite: Monk Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
prerequisite_markdown: [Monk Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=715); class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
